sys_remote_update_set.description:
"El administrador del sistema, puede tener la posibilidad de crear incidencias desde SOLMAN, para que pueda ser atendida dentro de ServiceNow por los grupos de atención según lo acordado. Que todos los cambios de estatus de la incidencia puedan ser reflejados de ServiceNow a SOLMAN. Datos que enviará SOLMAN a ServiceNow: - Usuario Afectado - Categoría - Descripción Corta - Descripción - Urgencia - Impacto - Tenant - Tipo
Datos que enviará ServiceNow a SOLMAN - Número de Incidencia - Estatús
Creación de script para consumir API de Solman Endpoint: https://devl012azms01.itesm.mx:44300/zconfirm?sap-client=001 10.97.28.26 Authentication: Basic authentication (user name and password to be provided) Method: POST Sample Payload: {"incident:": "INC00607271", è ServiceNow incident number "status": "Resolved", è status value should be Resolved "comment": "Ticket Resolved"} è Free text
sys_remote_update_set.name: HBR-HU393-API REST SOLMAN-DIFG-V1

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DVT_SolmanLibrary</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Library containing the necessary methods for the connection to solman.</description><name>DVT_SolmanLibrary</name><script><![CDATA[var DVT_SolmanLibrary = Class.create();
DVT_SolmanLibrary.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    sendAlert: function(incNumber, incStatus, incComment, sapClient) {
        var requestBody;
        var responseBody;
        var status;
        var sm;
		var log='DVT\n';
        try {

            sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2("DVT- confirm the Solman alert", "zconfirm");
            sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("incident", incNumber);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("status", incStatus);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("comment", incComment);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("sap-client", sapClient);
            sm.setHttpTimeout(10000); //In milliseconds. Wait at most 10 seconds for response from http request.

            response = sm.execute(); //Might throw exception if http connection timed out or some issue with sending request itself because of encryption/decryption of password.
            responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
            status = response.getStatusCode();
        } catch (ex) {
            responseBody = ex.getMessage();
            status = '500';
        } finally {
            requestBody = sm ? sm.getRequestBody() : null;
        }
		log+='Request Body: ' + requestBody+'\n';
		log+='Response: ' + responseBody+'\n';
		log+='HTTP Status: ' + status+'\n';

		gs.info(log);
       
    },

    type: 'DVT_SolmanLibrary'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-25 16:46:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DVT_SolmanLibrary</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-25 17:42:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var lib = new global.DVT_SolmanLibrary();
	var comment=current.comments.getJournalEntry(1);
	//is state is Resolved or closed
	if(current.state==6||current.state==7)
	{
		comment= current.close_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	}
	lib.sendAlert(current.number, current.state.getDisplayValue(), comment, '001');
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-25 16:58:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HBR-Solman Conecction</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-08 19:39:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>es</language><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-08 19:34:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>d5e517e0971c0a10655570700153af78</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-08 19:34:52</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
        var infoLog = 'HIBERUS. \n';
        infoLog += "Caller id: " + current.caller_id + "\n";
        if (current.caller_id == '') {
            current.caller_id = current.opened_by;
        }
        infoLog += "u_institution: " + current.u_institution + "\n";
        if (current.u_institution == '') {
            infoLog += "category: " + current.category + "\n";
            if (current.category == 'monitoreo') {
                current.u_institution = 'Tec de Monterrey';
                if (current.subcategory == 'occ-jobs_tecsalud') {
                    current.u_institution = 'TecSalud';
                }
            }
            infoLog += "NUEVA u_institution: " + current.u_institution + "\n";
        }
        gs.info(infoLog);
    }

)(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-06 17:34:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bc76204047180610676de567436d43e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HBR-New Solman Inc</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bc76204047180610676de567436d43e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-08 16:02:10</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bc76204047180610676de567436d43e1"/></record_update>
